Your team’s collective brain
============================

A modern, simple, and blazingly fast way to collaborate – bring knowledge, docs, and projects together in one place.

[GET STARTED](https://app.nuclino.com/signup)

![Image 1: Logo of Paddle](https://www.nuclino.com/img/logos/nasa.svg)![Image 2: Logo of Ubisoft](https://www.nuclino.com/img/logos/ubisoft.svg)

![Image 3: Logo of MIT](https://www.nuclino.com/img/logos/mit.svg)![Image 4: Logo of Paddle](https://www.nuclino.com/img/logos/paddle.svg)

Everything in one place
-----------------------

Organize knowledge, manage projects, share ideas, and more.

![Image 5: Content Image Example](https://www.nuclino.com/img/content-image-example.jpg)

![Image 6: Content Image Example](https://www.nuclino.com/img/content-image-example.jpg)

### Unified space

Replace multiple collaboration tools with just one to prevent silos and reduce context switching.

### Super simple

Designed to be simple and intuitive in every way – without complexity or clutter to distract you.

### Blazingly fast

Built for speed from the ground up – quick setup, instant search, hotkeys, and more.

[LEARN MORE](https://www.nuclino.com/product)

Trusted by 12,000+ teams
------------------------

[Nuclino is saving us hours when it comes to finding 'that one thing', be it a process, a design sketch, or meeting notes. ![Image 7: Matt Bond](https://www.nuclino.com/img/quotes/psyon-games-quote.jpg) Matt Bond Lead Game Designer at Psyon Games](https://www.nuclino.com/customers/psyon-games)[The easy and clutter-free editor of Nuclino made it enticing to start writing documents. ![Image 8: Soroush Khodaii](https://www.nuclino.com/img/quotes/invoice-simple-quote.jpg) Soroush Khodaii Head of Growth Eng. at Invoice Simple](https://www.nuclino.com/customers/invoice-simple)[Nuclino is the de facto tool here, people use it as a synonym for a clear document – "Can you create a Nuclino on this"? ![Image 9: Octave Auger](https://www.nuclino.com/img/quotes/paddle-quote.jpg) Octave Auger VP Marketing at Paddle](https://www.nuclino.com/customers/paddle)

[Nuclino's bright, clean interface is an open invitation for my team members to dive right in. ![Image 10: Chris Fabiszak](https://www.nuclino.com/img/quotes/turn2partners-quote.png) Chris Fabiszak VP Operations at Turn2Partners](https://www.nuclino.com/customers/turn2partners)[Nuclino is super simple and intuitive, has a very low barrier to entry, and is super fast and reliable. ![Image 11: Marc van Neerven](https://www.nuclino.com/img/quotes/neerventure-quote.png) Marc van Neerven CTO at Neerventure](https://www.nuclino.com/customers/neerventure)[Adopting Nuclino at Vistaprint has resulted in fewer meetings, less code re-work, and faster development. ![Image 12: Samuel Haddad](https://www.nuclino.com/img/quotes/vistaprint-quote.jpg) Samuel Haddad Lead Software Engineer at Vistaprint](https://www.nuclino.com/customers/vistaprint)

[CUSTOMER STORIES](https://www.nuclino.com/customers)

Ready to get started?
---------------------

[GET STARTED](https://app.nuclino.com/signup)

![Image 13: Character illustration](https://www.nuclino.com/img/character.svg)
